statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_redemption;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_redemption;
SELECT customer_id, redeemed_rewards FROM loyalty_redemption WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT redeemed_rewards, redemption_date FROM loyalty_redemption ORDER BY redemption_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, redemption_date FROM loyalty_redemption WHERE redeemed_rewards >= 5;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_redemption WHERE redeemed_rewards > 0;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_redemption WHERE redeemed_rewards = 0;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_redemption WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_id, SUM(loyalty_points) AS total_points FROM loyalty_redemption GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, redemption_date FROM loyalty_redemption ORDER BY redemption_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points, reward_code, redemption_date FROM CustomerRedemption;
SELECT reward_code, customer_id, redemption_date, loyalty_points FROM CustomerRedemption;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM InventoryManagement;
SELECT price, product_name, quantity, product_id FROM InventoryManagement;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points, reward_code FROM CustomerRedemption WHERE redemption_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points, reward_code, redemption_date FROM CustomerRedemption WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM CustomerRedemption WHERE loyalty_points > 500 ORDER BY redemption_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(loyalty_points) AS total_points FROM CustomerRedemption GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_points > 1000;
SELECT product_name, price FROM InventoryManagement WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points, redemption_date FROM CustomerRedemption WHERE reward_code LIKE 'ABC%' ORDER BY redemption_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_rewards;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer WHERE loyalty_points >= 100;
SELECT redemption_date, redeem_status FROM loyalty_rewards ORDER BY redemption_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, available_quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE available_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customer WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_rewards WHERE redemption_date >= '2023-01-01' AND redeem_status = 'Active';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customer WHERE loyalty_points > 1000 ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE available_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT c.customer_name, r.redemption_date, i.item_name FROM customer c JOIN loyalty_rewards r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id JOIN inventory i ON i.item_id = r.reward_id;

SELECT DISTINCT c.customer_name, c.customer_id, r.redemption_date, i.item_name FROM customer c JOIN loyalty_rewards r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id JOIN inventory i ON i.item_id = r.reward_id WHERE r.redeem_status = 'Redeemed';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_rewards WHERE redemption_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT reward_name, point_cost FROM rewards WHERE available_quantity > 0;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(loyalty_points) AS total_points FROM customers GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, quantity FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT reward_name, point_cost, available_quantity FROM rewards WHERE point_cost < 50 ORDER BY available_quantity DESC;
SELECT customer_name, redemption_date, redeemed_quantity FROM customers c JOIN loyalty_rewards lr ON c.customer_id = lr.customer_id WHERE redeemed_quantity > 10;

SELECT t.transaction_id, c.customer_name, r.reward_name, t.transaction_date FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN rewards r ON t.reward_id = r.reward_id WHERE t.quantity = 1 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT reward_name, points_required FROM Rewards ORDER BY points_required DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(redemption_id) AS total_redemptions FROM RedemptionHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_redemptions > 3;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT Reward.reward_name, RedemptionHistory.redemption_date FROM Reward JOIN RedemptionHistory ON Reward.reward_id = RedemptionHistory.reward_id;
SELECT Customer.customer_name, SUM(LoyaltyPoints.points) AS total_points FROM Customer JOIN LoyaltyPoints ON Customer.customer_id = LoyaltyPoints.customer_id GROUP BY Customer.customer_name;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
